title: Artificial intelligence fears are misplaced
description: There's nothing scary about the progress we can achieve with the power of artificial intelligence.
content: Amid shaken trust in U.S. institutions, information is our most valuable currency. Enter artificial intelligence, which is revolutionizing our access to information and informing Americans in ways once thought unimaginable. From politics to law and m... [4642 chars]

title: New Zealand Launches Ask Groov: 24/7 AI Mental Health Support Tool for Kiwis
description: The launch marks a pivotal moment in New Zealand’s mental health landscape, combining cutting-edge artificial intelligence with clinical expertise to provide reliable, on-demand mental wellness guidance.

title: Artificial Intelligence to cause 'homework apocalypse' in Irish schools

content:

title: TCS to create 5,000 jobs in the UK, launches AI experience zone in London
description: Tata Consultancy Services will create 5,000 new jobs in the United Kingdom over the next three years. The Indian IT giant is also launching an Artificial Intelligence Experience Zone and Design Studio in London. This new facility will foster innovation and client collaboration. TCS has a long history in the UK, supporting digital transformation for over 50 years.

title: AI's Growing Role in Finance: Risk or Opportunity?
description: Global financial regulators are closely monitoring the increasing use of artificial intelligence in the financial industry. Concerns include the widespread adoption of similar AI models and hardware, potentially causing systemic risks. Authorities emphasize the need for enhanced capabilities in understanding and utilizing AI technology effectively.
content: Global financial regulators are intensifying their scrutiny of the financial industry's growing reliance on artificial intelligence. As banks and other entities accelerate their use of AI, authorities caution against the widespread adoption of identi... [746 chars]

title: With AI slop on the rise, Elon Musk says Grok will soon detect deepfakes and track down their origin
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is improving every day. Users are now easily able to generate realistic videos with AI, raising concerns over deepfakes in the future. Tech billionaire Elon Musk has now claimed that Grok will soon be able to detect AI clips and find its source.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the internet. Tools like Grok Imagine and Sora have made it easy for anyone to create realistic AI-generated videos. This has raised alarms for many who believe that this could allow anyone to create deepf... [1912 chars]

title: AI buzz powers SK Hynix and Samsung stock to record highs
